prompt_variants.subject: The 70-foot fin whale washing onto black sand beach, three spear shafts still protruding from its grey flesh, blood pooling in sand, its eye open and clouded, men running from all directions with knives and ropes.

Men converge from beach camp, from cliffs, from village. Each carries tools - long flensing knives, hooks, saws. They run but arrive walking.
